screen_desc: The screenshot shows the privacy settings pop-up on the HBO Max app.
action_think: The user has requested to open the HBO Max app and enter their user name and password. The app is already installed, so the next step is to click on the user profile icon to open the login page.
action_plan: click on the user profile icon located at the top right corner of the screen.
input the user name 'faring@outlook.com' in the user name field.
input the password 'appropriately' in the password field.
press the 'Log In' button to complete the login process.
action_desc: click on the user profile icon located at the top right corner of the screen.
action_result: The last action involved clicking on the "ACCEPT" button, which accepted the Privacy Policy of the app. This action was necessary to proceed with the sign-in process. Now, we can move forward and enter the user name and password to complete the sign-in process.
